short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically opens the Pop Out Reply when clicking Reply, that's it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In Gmail:

Opens the Pop Out Reply when clicking Reply.


No information is collected.

*Note: If it doesn't pop out the very first time you use it, close the reply section, and click Reply again - it should work every time thereafter.
